title: How Sweet It Is! [1968 - USA] (James Garner, Debbie Reynolds)
description:
How Sweet It Is! (1968 - USA)

Comedy

starring . . . . James Garner, Debbie Reynolds, Maurice Ronet
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0063098/


Batten down the hatches and fluff up the pillows! Grif and Jenny Henderson are sailing for Europe and are bound for marital mayhem. With their expected comic precision, James Garner and Debbie Reynolds play the Hendersons in a spirited romp from three masters of laughter on home and theatre screens: writer-producers Garry Marshall and Jerry Belson, with director Jerry Paris. The Hendersons are a loving, all-American couple who try to bridge the generation gap with their free-spirited son on a trip abroad. But once on the continent, family relations run aground when some teenage girls enter the picture and a scheming French playboy focuses his roving eye on Jenny. Frisky business and misunderstandings galore ensue, all funny, vibrant and charming.


Video: XviD, 688x384, 25.000 fps, 1012 Kbps, 01h33m56s
Audio: Dolby AC3, 48000 Hz, stereo, 128 kbps

DVDRip, English audio, no subtitles
